name: Vibrant Data Overview
description: A mobile dashboard providing a high-level overview of key metrics using visually distinct cards.

atoms.name: Rounded Data Card
atoms.description: A rounded card with a distinct background color for visual separation of data.

atoms.name: Metric Title
atoms.description: A bold title used to highlight key metrics.

atoms.name: Label Text
atoms.description: Smaller, muted text used for labels and descriptions.

atoms.name: Pastel Background
atoms.description: Soft pastel background colors to differentiate data cards.

code.tailwind: rounded-2xl bg-white p-4 mb-2 shadow-sm text-gray-600

best_for: Applications needing a clean and modern look
avoid_for: Applications needing a serious or corporate aesthetic
